attributes.additional_details: Nuisance calls and cold calling is on the increase they are calling from abroad with the number clearly stating its country. Others some how use local number but are from abroad.
attributes.background: They range from selling wills, PPI, accident injury claim to winning holidays. Callers are becoming ruder, more aggressive and threatening. We feel that UK citizens should not be subjected to such abuse. We call upon the government to do more to protect its
